Number of confirmed cases each 100.000 people

R_t is the expected number of secondary cases produced by infected individuals, who turns infectious on day t. If a source does not provide this number it will be estimated as the ratio of confirmed cases between last 7 days against the previous seven days.
Number of imported cases for the respective pathogen and reporting period
Number of mass media or social media articles by publication date over a particular topic. These articles are classified using Machine learning algorithms on several public health topics
